metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4395 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php in ownCloud before4.0.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe redirect_url parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.6debian-0ubuntu1').
